newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 7.41 pct at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 7.41 pct at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 8.5 trillion lire 5-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 7.41 percent, compared with 7.35 percent at the previous repo tender on February 26, the Bank said.
The average rate was 7.42 percent against 7.37 percent at the last repurchase pact for 9.5 trillion lire and 26 days.
The pact covers purchases today and the securities are for resale on March 17. The Bank said it received 39 bids of which 11 were met in full and eight in part.
